remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果该字段为 `static` ，则 `obj` 忽略该参数。If the field is `static`, the `obj` parameter is ignored. 对于非静态字段， `obj` 应为继承或声明该字段的类的实例。For non-static fields, `obj` should be an instance of a class that inherits or declares the field. 的返回类型 为 。The return type of is . 例如，如果该字段包含布尔基元值， 则返回一个具有相应布尔值的实例。For example, if the field holds a Boolean primitive value, an instance of with the appropriate Boolean value is returned. 返回该值之前，请 检查用户是否具有访问权限。Before returning the value, checks to see if the user has access permission. 对于完全受信任的代码，将忽略访问限制。Access restrictions are ignored for fully-trusted code. `Private` 只要代码完全受信任，就可以使用反射来访问和调用构造函数、方法、字段和属性。`Private` constructors, methods, fields, and properties can be accessed and invoked using Reflection whenever the code is fully-trusted.

exception.span: 不支持此方法。

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void SetConstant(object defaultValue) cil managed

param.name: defaultValue
param.span: 该字段的新默认值。

span.span: The new default value for this field.

summary.span: 设置该字段的默认值。

span.span: Sets the default value of this field.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `defaultValue` 限制为以下类型： `Boolean` 、、、、、、、、、、、、、 `SByte` `Int16` `Int32` `Int64` `Byte` `UInt16` `UInt32` `UInt64` `Single` `Double` `DateTime` `Char` `String` 和 `Enum` 。`defaultValue` is restricted to the following types: `Boolean`, `SByte`, `Int16`, `Int32`, `Int64`, `Byte`, `UInt16`, `UInt32`, `UInt64`, `Single`, `Double`, `DateTime`, `Char`, `String`, and `Enum`. 如果字段类型为引用类型，则 CLS 遵从性要求为 `defaultValue` `null` 。If the field type is a reference type, CLS compliance requires `defaultValue` to be `null`. 但是，对于引用类型，从 .NET Framework 4 开始， `defaultValue` 只要可将值分配给该引用类型，就不能为 null。However, starting with the .NET Framework 4, `defaultValue` can be non-null for a reference type as long as the value can be assigned to that reference type. 例如， `Int32` 可以将一个值分配给类型为的字段 。For example, an `Int32` value can be assigned to a field of type . 这不符合 CLS，但在互操作方案中可能很有用。This is not CLS-compliant, but it can be useful in interop scenarios.

summary.span: 设置给定对象支持的字段的值。

span.span: Sets the value of the field supported by the given object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法会将 `val` 参数分配给在上由此实例反映的字段 `obj` 。This method will assign the `val` parameter to the field reflected by this instance on `obj`. 如果该字段为静态，则 `obj` 将被忽略。If the field is static, `obj` will be ignored. 对于非静态字段， `obj` 应为继承或声明该字段的类的实例。For non-static fields, `obj` should be an instance of a class that inherits or declares the field. 新值作为传递 。The new value is passed as an . 例如，如果该字段的类型为布尔 值，则会传递一个具有适当布尔值的实例。For example, if the field's type is Boolean, an instance of with the appropriate Boolean value is passed. 设置该值之前，请 检查用户是否具有访问权限。Before setting the value, checks to see if the user has access permission. 对于完全受信任的代码，将忽略访问限制。Access restrictions are ignored for fully-trusted code. `Private` 只要代码完全受信任，就可以使用反射来访问和调用构造函数、方法、字段和属性。`Private` constructors, methods, fields, and properties can be accessed and invoked using Reflection whenever the code is fully-trusted. > [!NOTE] > 当前不支持该方法。This method is currently not supported. 作为一种解决方法， 可通过反射完成类型并调用 来设置字段的值，来检索。As a workaround, retrieve the by reflecting on the finished type and call to set the value of the field.

exception.span: 不支持此方法。

span.span: This method is not supported.
